attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are currently one of the most Taxed countries in the World, and a lot of it is indirect taxing, using names to try and convince people it's not actually a tax. Stop it! It's not fair on the people who can't see through the semantics. Call a Tax a Tax so everyone know's just how much of our hard earnt money we lose!
